This site contains the workshop schedule, links, and other information about the StatPREP Summer workshops.

* [Getting ready for the workshop.](getting_ready.html)

* [Workshop schedule](schedule.html), activity-by-activity. Participants should bookmark this link in their browser for easy access during the workshop.

* Timing, contacts, and directions for the individual workshops:

    - [University of Hartford](Hartford/index.html), CT June 1 & 2, 2018
    - [College of Saint Catherine](StKates/index.html), Saint Paul, MN June 8 & 9, 2018
    - [Highland College](Highline/index.html), Seattle, WA June 15 & 16, 2018
    - [College of the Canyons](Canyons/index.html), Santa Clarita, CA June 22 & 23
